Package iot

Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
iot.Simulation
public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
A class representing a simulation.

    • getApproach

      public GenericFeedbackLoop getApproach()

    • initialiseMote

      public void initialiseMote()
      Initialise the configuration and motes if option 2 without network is chosen The earlier routing application will be destructed, single run will be set up and all the gateways in the environment will be moved. This is necessarilly because otherwise there will be sent unusable packages to the motes causing possible errors For network option 2, every adaptation that will be made to the path of the mote will be determined before simulation and the path belonging to the start position will be set as the start path of the mote

    • simulateVisualiseRun

      public void simulateVisualiseRun​(PollutionEnvironment Pollenvironment)
      Simulate a single step in the simulator but isn't visible This run is intended for getting data to visualise the results of doing adaptations

    • simulateVisualiseRun2

      public void simulateVisualiseRun2​(PollutionEnvironment Pollenvironment)
      Simulate a single step in the simulator but isn't visible This run is intended for getting data to visualise the results of doing adaptations

    • simulateStep

      public void simulateStep​(PollutionEnvironment Pollenvironment)
      Simulate a single step in the simulator.
      Parameters:
      Pollenvironment - the pollution environment used in the environment

    • simulateStepRun2

      public void simulateStepRun2​(PollutionEnvironment Pollenvironment)
      Simulating a simulation step Used for simulating a simulationstep where every adaptation of every biker is determined before visualise the simulation run
      Parameters:
      Pollenvironment - the pollution environment that is used in the environment

    • isFinished

      public boolean isFinished()
      Function to determine if the siulation is finished
      Returns:
      true if all motes are arrived to their destination

    • simulateStepRun

      public void simulateStepRun​(PollutionEnvironment Pollenvironment)
      Function for doing a simulation without a network
      Parameters:
      Pollenvironment - the pollutionenvironment that is used for the simulation

    • RunIsFinishedForResults

      public boolean RunIsFinishedForResults()
      Function to decide if run for simulations for gathering results is finished
      Returns:
      true if simulation is finished, false otherwise

    • RunisFinished

      public boolean RunisFinished()
      Function to decide if run is finished for runs without network
      Returns:
      true if run is finished, false otherwise
